about_the_game:
Get ready to meet the Letalis—fierce warriors who fight for glory, risking it all in battle. It’s a high-stakes showdown where strategy and adrenaline collide. As the Manager, your goal is clear: rise to the rank of Caesar. To get there, you’ll have to journey across the continent, conquer challenges, and take on every Colosseum that stands in your way. Earn the respect of the people as you prove your strength in battles that will push you to your limits!


Explore a Non-Linear World:
Embark on a journey across diverse landscapes, battling fierce enemies and helping towns in need as you search for Colosseums to show your strength.


Glory or Death:
The clash of Letalis is a spectacle of raw power and unyielding determination. As they charge into battle, their shouts echo across the battlefield, fueled by adrenaline and the thirst for glory. With each swing of their mighty axes and swords, sparks fly and metal clashes, filling the air with the sound of combat. For those who fall after a hard-fought fight, there is no shame—only honor.


Manage your Team:
Find the perfect balance of fighting styles for your Letalis lineup, equipping them with the right weapons to match your strategy and boost their combat skills. Experiment with different combinations to create a playstyle that's uniquely yours.


Intense Colosseum Battles:
The ultimate test of your might! Three battles in a row, where every move could be your last. Study your opponents' patterns, exploit their lineups, and claim victory against their Caesar.


Unlock World Mysteries:
Immerse yourself in the lives of the citizens to uncover hidden secrets and gain insight into the realm's tangled web of political intrigue. As you unravel the mysteries, you'll expose schemes of power and discover forgotten dungeons filled with untold treasures and ancient artifacts waiting to be found.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Letalis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II x2 550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or AMD Phenom II x4 945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Letalis is a a non-linear RPG set in coliseums controlled by Caesars, where you train warriors called 'Letalis' to fight for “Glory or Death”. Delve into a unique journey with over a thousand Letalis, each with their own fighting styles, quirks, and aesthetics.
